mapper.select: SELECT a.MBR_ID as memberId ,a.MBR_EMLADDR as email ,a.MBR_NM as name ,a.MBR_GNDR as genderId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b WHERE a.MBR_GNDR=b.CD_ID AND b.GRP_VAL='06') as genderNm ,a.BRTH_DAY as birthday ,a.HEIGHT as height ,a.PASSWORD as password ,a.USE_YN as useYn ,a.REG_DT as regDt ,a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_FS_MEMBER a WHERE a.USE_YN='Y' AND a.MBR_EMLADDR = '${value}'
